data.eml:eml: Four new endemic genera of Rubiaceae (Pavetteae) from Madagascar represent multiple radiations into drylands

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Block, Petra De, Rakotonasolo, Franck, Ntore, Salvator, Sylvain G. Razafimandimbison,, Janssens, Steven (2018): Four new endemic genera of Rubiaceae (Pavetteae) from Madagascar represent multiple radiations into drylands. PhytoKeys 99: 1-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.99.23713, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.99.23713
